reviewText: I've watched this movie at least three times in a span of 4-5 years. At first I really didn't get this movie, but then again I was just starting to watch foreign dramas. Every time I watch it now I fall more in love with the characters and the story though after just a few short years of watching drama's in both movie and series format certain aspects of the plot are cliche but it's my guilty pleasure nonetheless. I can't believe the movie is so expensive though, it's on my wishlist for sure
